title: Google's AI video maker Veo 3 is now available via $20 Gemini
summary: Google says Veo 3, which is the company's state-of-the-art video generator, is now shipping to everyone using the Gemini app with a $20 subscription. [...]

title: ChatGPT Deep Research tests new connectors for more context
